content: गीता [गै कर्मणि क्त] A name given to certain sacred writings in verse (often in the form of a dialogue) which are devoted to the exposition of particular religious and theosophical doctrines; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} शिवगीता, रामगीता, भगवद्गीता. But the name appears to be especially confined tothe last, the Bhagavadgītā; गीतासुगीता कर्तव्या किमन्यैः शास्त्रविस्तरैः . या स्वयं पद्मनाभस्य मुखपद्माद्विनिःसृता .. quoted by Śrīdharasvāmin.
